name: Flippy Fruit
description:
Enjoy flipping with Flippy Fruit!

Flip your way through an endless adventure with 5 different fruity characters. Engage yourself in 2 different game modes.

Endless:
- Get the highest score you can with no time limit. The game ends once you die.

Time Trial:
- Finish the trail as fast as you can. Race against yourself and try to beat your high score!

Happy flipping!
